node.title: Woman Assaults Maintenance Worker in Video Viewed Over 6M Times, Is Allegedly Evicted
node.alt: A trailer park maintenance worker was physically assaulted by a woman after asking her to move out of the way so she could continue leaf blowing the sidewalk. The worker's sister told Newsweek she is doing alright but is pressing charges.
node.description: "I seriously hope you ruined her life," one user commented on the video.
node.content:
["A TikToker has gone viral after sharing a video of a trailer park maintenance worker being physically assaulted by a woman, dubbed a \"Karen\" by the internet.", "The video, posted by user @srryup, received more than 6.6 million views since being posted on Thursday. In the video, @srryup said their sister was the person who was assaulted and recorded the footage of the altercation.", "\"So my sister got attacked by a Karen today,\" the caption of the video read.", "In the video, the maintenance worker asked the woman to step out of the way so she could continue blowing leaves off the sidewalk, but the woman refused.", "\"Can I do my job please?\" the worker asked in the video. \"I'm trying to get the leaves out of the road.\"", "At that point in the video, the woman on the phone began getting closer to the maintenance worker.", "\"Oh my god, get out of my face,\" she said to the 'Karen.' \"You're so dumb get out of my face.\"", "The maintenance worker then told the woman that if she wasn't able to do her job because she was blocking the sidewalk. That's when the woman physically grabbed the maintenance worker and told them to get away from their car.", "\"That car's for my daughter,\" the woman began yelling as she was simultaneously on the phone.", "That's when the maintenance worker was allegedly pushed by the woman and the phone fell to the ground with neither woman in view of the camera.", "\"Want to go b*tch?\" the woman could be heard saying to the maintenance worker. \"You wanna go?\"", "The viral clip ended with the phone on the ground with yelling in the background.", "In a follow up video, @srryup said their sister was okay but posted pictures of the injuries that she suffered from the altercation including scrapes and bruises across her body.", "@Srryup also said that their daughter posted footage of the woman allegedly being served eviction papers. The footage, posted to TikTok by @meefycow, showed the maintenance worker's boss approaching a house with papers in hand.", "\"My aunts boss giving the Karen a eviction notice,\" the text on-screen read.", "The video also explained that the woman was allegedly being served a 30-day eviction notice for the assault. @Meefycow also claimed in the comments that her aunt did press charges against the woman.", "More than 22,000 people replied to the original video of the assault and many of the comments were making fun of the woman.", "\"There's a reason god doesn't put me in situations like this,\" one user wrote. \"She wouldn't survive it.\"", "Others commented that they hope the maintenance worker is okay and that they hope she presses charges against the woman.", "\"I seriously hope you ruined her life,\" one user commented and received more than 43,000 likes.", "", "
A trailer park maintenance worker was physically assaulted by a woman after asking her to move out of the way so she could continue leaf blowing the sidewalk. The worker's sister told Newsweek she is doing alright but is pressing charges.
", "Amanda Nicole Martinez, 31, was arrested following the assault in Temple, Texas, on November 7. The altercation began after Martinez complained to a staff member about the soup she ordered.", "Martinez told the staff that her soup was too hot and caused the plastic lid on top to melt, KWTX10 reported.", "In a video of the altercation which was posted to TikTok and viewed more than 7.8 million times, Martinez picked up the soup and threw it at a female employee's face. She then allegedly left the restaurant."]
